data.comment: The match has started.
Coventry take a 1-0 lead thanks to Gustavo Hamer.
In the minute 23, Matt Godden with an assist there.
Leo Ostigard (Coventry) has received a first yellow card.
Coventry's Gustavo Hamer has been booked in Birmingham.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Lucas Joao is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 66, That's a fine assist from Josh Laurent.
The home team replace Gustavo Hamer with Callum O`Hare.
Goal! Coventry have got their heads in front thanks to a Matt Godden strike.
In the minute 79, Michael Rose (Coventry) has received a yellow card from David Webb.
Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a first substitution, with George Puscas replacing Michael Olise.
Tom McIntyre is on a sub for Liam Moore for Reading.
In the minute 82, Coventry make their second substitution with Sam McCallum replacing Fankaty Dabo.
Dominic Hyam for Coventry has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Coventry extend their lead to 3-1 through Sam McCallum.
In the minute 85, Great play from Michael Rose to set up the goal.
At St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium, Marko Marosi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Jamie Allen is replacing Jordan Shipley for the home team.
David Webb blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
Goal! George Puscas pulls one back for Reading to make it 3-2.
Lucas Joao instrumental with a fine assist.
